title: the day the earth stood still 2008 dvdrip high def
description:
Widely acclaimed as one of the most influential sci-fi films of all time, THE DAY THE EARTH STOOD STILL offers riveting and thought provoking sci- fi filmmaking at its very best.  now this classic story of hope and peace can be experienced to its fullest in this special edition dvd.

A spaceship lands in Washington D.C.,capturing the attention of the world.  But this alien embassy (Keanu Reeves) it brings, refuses to reveal his mission to any single goverment, leaving the military, the politicians and millions of ordinary people to wait in fear.  Soon their distrust turns to call for violence.  But one young woman and her son (Jennifer Connelly)befriended him...and soon realized that they may be all that stands between the human race and total destruction.
